text:
In xerces-J 2.6.2:

If an HTMLDocumentImpl contains a document type node, calling clone on the
document will throw a NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR DomException. This does not happen with
DocumentImpl, which explicitly sets the cloningdoc parameter to true.
creator: russgold@gmail.com

text:
Bug reports against Xerces2 should be made using Apache's Jira 
(http://issues.apache.org/jira).  Xerces-J 1, now dead, used Bugzilla.
creator: neilg@ca.ibm.com
